dd %>% 
  mutate(now = weighted.time) %>% 
  mutate(future = 30/42.39*weighted.time) %>% 
  select(SA2, now, future, pop, emp) %>% 
  gather(key, value, -SA2, -pop, -emp) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=value, col=key, weight = pop*emp)) + 
  geom_density() + 
  # geom_vline(xintercept = 30, linetype = 2) + 
  xlab(\Weighted average travel time (min)\") +
